Title: Delver's Call: Tak-Rethan Abyss
Description:
WEAVER'S ORDERS

The kobyss are growing bold down within Tak-Rethan Abyss.

Someone must keep them in check before they arise to become a problem to our plans.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Tak-Rethan Abyss delve on any difficulty.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Widow Arak'nai within the Weaver's Lair.
RewardText: Fine work. I shall let you know if I require any further kobyss-related purges.

Objectives.Text: Tak-Rethan Abyss delve completed on any difficulty
